Heartstopper - Gives the illusion of death for up to a minute, allowing you to slip away from your "grave" with the enemy unaware of your survival.

Grappling Hook/Suction Cups - Allows you to scale walls, and fake your death by jumping out of windows.

Posion - Works like a knife, slowly drains the health of a victim, but gives the illusion of suicide.

Spray Paint - Allows you to paint blood on the walls, distracting players from a target.

Picklock - Allows you to open a door, despite objects obstructing it.

Tripwire - Sets of a hidden explosive when walked over.

Smokescreen - Fills an entire area with smoke AT EYE-LEVEL, allowing the traitor to take out victims from underneath the smog.
Trip Wire is the best, Spray Paint is the easiest to code.
